title: Dell security advisory (AV25-558)
description: Between August 25 and 31, 2025, Dell published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Dell Avamar Data Store Ge5A  versions prior to 2.24.0
Dell Avamar Data Store Ge5A  versions prior to 7.00.00.181
Dell Networking Products  multiple models and versions
Dell NetWorker Runtime Environment (NRE)  versions prior to 17.0.2
Dell Private Cloud VMWare  versions prior to 01.01.00.00
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
